attributes.action: Make it leagl for all landlords to provide an emergency number for tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had water running through the elctric light in the lounge and my Landlord was not available for 15 hours leaving us with no water, heating or electricity supply. I would not have been reimbursed had I called someone else to do the work. This obviously is not fair on tentants and it put lives at risk.
